channel.title: Our Best Recipes
channel.description: Recent content on Our Best Recipes

item.title: Sunday Crepes Recipe
item.description: Ingredients - 15 larges crepes 4 eggs 500 ml of milk 1.5 cups of gluten free flour 2 table spoon of coconut oil Preparation - 10 minutes In a large mixing bowl, create a well with flour then add eggs, slowly whisking them into flour. Gradually add the milk, whisking to combine. Let batter stand at room temperature until bubbly on top, 40 minutes to 1 hour.
